articles.description: Mahindananda Aluthgamage's remarks come a day after local police dropped an investigation into the claims, citing a lack of evidence that Sri Lanka deliberately lost the final to hosts India.
articles.content:
Sri Lanka's former sports minister said Saturday he has offered more evidence to cricket's world governing body that he says shows the 2011 World Cup was fixed.

articles.title: Hideouts of accused in fake Sri Lankan league scam raided - The Indian Express
articles.description: A police team visited the SCA ground at Sawara village on Friday afternoon. The team was accompanied by two officials from the cyber security wing and collected the mobile data dump to identify the players involved in the matches played on June 29.

articles.title: Sports Ministry to remove salary cap of Rs 2 lakh for Indian coaches - Times of India
articles.description: More sports News: The Sports Ministry on Saturday announced its decision to do away with the Rs 2 lakh cap on the salary given to Indian coaches training elite athletes
